Introduction

Yushi is a Japanese singer under SM Entertainment. He is a member of NCT and its Japan-based sub-unit NCT Wish.

Prior to signing with SM, he was a member of the J-Pop boy group EBiDAN and its sub-unit EDAMAME BEANS.
